item.title: A Better Way to Pay for Health Care?
item.description: An innovator in the health-sharing space shows how to rein in costs while protecting human dignity.

item.title: Why Does Qatar Keep Helping Terrorists?
item.description: Qatar remains one of the world’s foremost proponents of violent Islamist movements and states. The U.S. should treat it accordingly.

item.title: Fight over Fired Inspectors General Is Fight over Foundations of the Administrative State
item.description: The move signals an overdue rebalancing of government.

item.title: Toward Joy Goes Off the Rails at the Brooklyn Museum
item.description: Angela Davis, the Nap Ministry, drag queen Miss Cracker, and a surreal, new take on American art.

item.title: When Union Activism Clashes with Workers’ Religious Beliefs
item.description: They have a right, legal and moral, not to join or pay dues.
